channel.title: Stanley Solutions Blog - education
channel.description: engineering and creativity - all under one hat

item.title: Jupyter Lab Setup for Electrical Engineers
item.description: Over the years, I've tried a few installation methods for Jupyter Notebooks and Jupyter lab. I've finally found one that I think is a little simpler than some of the others. Let me share that now for the benefit of Electrical Engineering students.
item.dc:creator: Joe Stanley
